name: Journey to The Game Dev Bird Conference
name_original: Journey to The Game Dev Bird Conference
description:
Endure the brutal existence of being a Game Developer while simultaneously being a Cute Bird. Fulfill your dream of attending the Game Developer Bird Conference through the good will and patronage of an anonymous online userbase. A foolproof plan indeed!

-Controls-

Code: Left click to select cards and make sets of 3. Right click to deselect. Space to redraw cards. Each card's feature must match or be different from the other 2 cards in the set.

Art: Left click to draw, use the sliders to adjust your brush.

Music: Up & down arrows to move lanes. Space to shoot. Match the notes to the designated tune.

Makhor - Programming

OtherThatGuy - Art, Programming

JamesyDownie - Audio

Updates:

a: Fixed scoring.

b: Added help to the code game, fixed cutscene.
